participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about culinary arts, enjoys exploring new flavors.
participant_1.background: I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers. wedding cakes are my specialty. My panda mug is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of my favorite animal. i am the oldest of three boys. I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, seeking fulfillment and self-expression through hobbies.
participant_2.background: I like to wear comfortable clothes to work. i like to play guitar. I don't feel fulfilled in my life and need to express myself more. I crashed my favorite RC car into a tree. I'm doing okay in school, though I'm a bit worried about my upcoming exams.

content.text: What kind of music do you like?
I like to listen to a variety of music, but my favorite is rock. I like to play guitar, but I'm not very good.
That's cool, I don't play any instruments. My favorite band is The Lumineers.
I've never heard of them, I'll have to check them out.
They're a folk rock band from Colorado. They're really good.
I like folk rock, I'll definitely check them out.
What's your favorite thing to do?
I like to play guitar and spend time with my friends. I'm also a bit of a nerd, so I like to play video games and watch anime.
I'm not much of a gamer, but I love to watch anime. What's your favorite anime?
I really like Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood. It's a really good story with great characters.
I've heard good things about that one. I've been meaning to check it out.
I'll have to add it to my list.
Cool, I hope you like it.
